endpoints.description: Retrieve the current planned logistics routes and schedules.
Submit data to optimize existing routes using AI-driven algorithms.
Update specific details of a previously planned route.
Remove a planned route from the system.
Retrieve analytical insights about vehicle fuel efficiency.
Access data and trends related to delivery times.
Enable integration with a third-party logistics service provider.
Check the status of integrated third-party services.
Modify the settings for delivery notifications and alerts.
Generate and retrieve a weekly summary report for logistics operations.
